Key Match Events: Wirtz scored in the 1st minute for Germany.
Havertz scored in the 49th minute for Germany.
Mbappe scored in the 68th minute for France.
Rabiot scored in the 73rd minute for France.
Nagelsmann received a yellow card in the 60th minute.
Andrich received a yellow card in the 68th minute.
Pre-Game Insights: France is hosting Germany at the Groupama Stadium for an international friendly.
This match represents both teams' first match of the year as Euro 2024 preparations heat up.
France came through their Euro 2024 qualifying group with seven wins and one draw.
Germany has been devoid of competitive action since exiting the World Cup in 2022 and has engaged solely in friendly matches during 2023.
Julian Nagelsmann is the current coach of Germany, having taken over after Hansi Flick was sacked.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Antoine Griezmann has pulled out of the France squad due to an ankle injury, ending his streak of 84 consecutive appearances for France.
Manuel Neuer is sidelined due to an adductor injury and is a doubt for his side's Champions League quarter-final with Arsenal.
Toni Kroos is back in the national team setup for the first time since Euro 2020 and is in line to win his 107th cap for Germany.
